item.title: Talks
item.description:
Knowledge Sharing

I love sharing a knowledge. This helps to build better and secure present and future for everyone.

  • Devs MeetUp: Trunk Based Development, Freiburg 2024
  • Steel Drum: Modern Digital Telephony Asterisk, Lviv 2017 1
  • Ruby Meetup: Using Pry For Debugging Rails Appliction, Kyiv 2016 2
  • ITSM Days: SLA and Service Management Best Practices, Kyiv 2015 3
  • V Habr Meetup: Service Constant Improvement, Kyiv 2015
  • Business Club Meetup: Why Business Owners should care of IT, Kyiv 2014 4
  • Clojure Workshop: Build Clojure Application from scratch: parsing a web site to the structure, Kyiv 2014 5

item.title: About
item.description:
Hi, my name is Maksym Prokopov. I’m in love with technology. That’s my passion and what I do on my daily job and beyond.

Before I got my first computer Intel 386 DX 40 in 1994, I used to write tiny programs on my MK61 programmable calculator. This was unforgettable experience and my first exposure to the von Neumann architecture. Soviet computer Corvette helped me to dive into programming when I was something like 13. Since then my journey didn’t end and I falled completely in love with the software engineering.
